verses.name: Numbers 12:8
verses.text: With him will I speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of the Lord shall he behold: wherefore then were ye not afraid to speak against my servant Moses?

verses.name: Numbers 12:9
verses.text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against them; and he departed.

verses.name: Numbers 12:10
verses.text: And the cloud departed from off the tabernacle; and, behold, Miriam became leprous, white as snow: and Aaron looked upon Miriam, and, behold, she was leprous.
